description: The Bwyd Sir Gar Food Partnership is a local initiative in Carmarthenshire, West Wales, established during the COVID pandemic. As a member of Sustainable Food Places, it aims to create a diverse, inclusive, and sustainable food system through collaboration with communities and stakeholders. The partnership focuses on projects that enhance food access, promote local sourcing, and empower disadvantaged communities, ensuring everyone has access to healthy, sustainable food while fostering community engagement and resilience.
name: Bwyd Sir Gar Food
